mapper.insert: insert into stock_hold (code, time_create, time_update, `status`, buy_amount, buy_price, hold_amount, sell_stage, weekly_ema_result_id, note, price_close, price_high, price_low, enhance_white_sign, lose_enhance_white_sign, price_sell_high, price_sell_low, close_ema_18, price_stop, generate_type) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyPrice,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{holdAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellStage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weeklyEmaResultId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceClose,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{priceHigh,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{priceLow,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{enhanceWhiteSign,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{loseEnhanceWhiteSign,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{priceSellHigh,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{priceSellLow,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{closeEma18,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{priceStop,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{generateType, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update stock_hold set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_create = #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_update = #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buy_amount = #{buyAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buy_price = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=FLOAT}, hold_amount = #{holdAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sell_stage = #{sellStage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weekly_ema_result_id = #{weeklyEmaResultId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_close = #{priceClose,jdbcType=FLOAT}, price_high = #{priceHigh,jdbcType=FLOAT}, price_low = #{priceLow,jdbcType=FLOAT}, enhance_white_sign = #{enhanceWhiteSign,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, lose_enhance_white_sign = #{loseEnhanceWhiteSign,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, price_sell_high = #{priceSellHigh,jdbcType=FLOAT}, price_sell_low = #{priceSellLow,jdbcType=FLOAT}, close_ema_18 = #{closeEma18,jdbcType=FLOAT}, price_stop = #{priceStop,jdbcType=FLOAT}, generate_type = #{generateType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from stock_hold
and code like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by time_create desc, id desc
limit #{page},#{size}

select count(*) from stock_hold
and code like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
